info.title: Mprimo API Documentation
info.description: Complete API documentation for Mprimo e-commerce platform with Chat & Support System, Shipping, and Subscription Management

get.description: Retrieve all messages for a specific dispute

post.description: Send a text message in a dispute chat
Upload and send an image in dispute chat

patch.description: Mark all messages in a dispute as read

post.description: Calculate shipping cost for a package

get.description: Track a shipment by waybill number
Get current subscription details for a vendor

post.description: Upgrade vendor subscription to a higher plan

400.description: Invalid plan or upgrade not allowed
